settings.title: Power Tools & Trade Supplies for Faversham
settings.paragraph_1: Faversham's wealth of listed buildings, timber-framed medieval houses and the thriving creek-side quarter create unique opportunities — and challenges — for local tradespeople. Our Canterbury branch is a quick 15-minute drive along the A2, giving Faversham's builders and joiners access to a proper trade counter with authorised Makita and DeWalt dealer status.
settings.paragraph_2: Heritage work in Faversham often means working with oak frames, lime plaster and traditional joinery — alongside modern extensions and kitchen fit-outs. Whether you need a precision track saw, a cordless planer for site work, or a heavy-duty SDS for structural alterations, we stock the professional tools that handle both sensitively and effectively.
settings.paragraph_3: Faversham is also home to a growing light industrial sector around the Standard Quay and Oare areas. Whatever your trade, Invicta Tools offers trade accounts with monthly invoicing, competitive pricing and free delivery over £30 to ME13 postcodes.

settings.title: Need Tools in Faversham?
settings.subtitle: Call our Canterbury branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
